LanguageData.FailFly_Lift: Mutations do not provide enough lift to fly.
LanguageData.MutaniteCentrifugeRunModeDesc: Enable or disable 'high yield' mode. This makes the centrifuge more efficent and faster, but dangerous to be around.
LanguageData.PMAnimalPickerGizmoDescription_Scanner: Select a tagged animal's genome for mutation sequencing.
LanguageData.PMExtractSlurryDesc: Extract some mechanite slurry from the tank. A pawn will come to extract it.
LanguageData.ChamberDatabaseIgnoresDataLimitTooltip: If true, adding things to the chamber database will not require data storage.
LanguageData.PMAnimalPickerGizmoDescription_Chamber: Start a mutagenic transformation into the selected animal.
LanguageData.PMPartPickerGizmoDescription: Precisely control mechanite configuration to select mutations for specific body parts.
LanguageData.PMMergeGizmoDescription: Merge two unfortunate pawns into one chaotic abomination.
LanguageData.NotEnoughStorageSpaceToTagPK: There is not enough storage to tag {0}. Requires {1} but only have {2}
LanguageData.PMDatabaseWithoutPower: Genebanks have lost power, cannot record new data.
LanguageData.PMAlreadyTaggedMulti: All mutations are already in genetic database.
LanguageData.AnimalNotTaggable: {0} is too genetically corrupted to be added.
LanguageData.PMNoMoreMutations: All {0} mutations have already been tagged.
LanguageData.PMSheepChefLetter: Between frantic bleats, the sheep that has arrived at the colony appears to say he's a celebrity chef. He can cook excellent meals if you'll let him stay.
LanguageData.FactionLeaderTransformedContent: {memberName}, former {leaderTitle} of the {factionName}, was turned into a {species} and can no longer lead. They've been replaced by {newLeader}.
LanguageData.RelatedWildFormerHumanContent: {0} is a former human related to {1} and has appeared on the map. They may still need to be tamed. They are {1}'s {2}.
LanguageData.RelatedSoldFormerHumanContent: {0} is a former human related to {1} and has appeared as part of a morph trader's stock. You can buy them if you want. They are {1}'s {2}.
LanguageData.PMLetterFormerHumanJoinContent:
{formerHuman_kindBaseIndef} approaches the colony. It seems {formerHuman_pronoun} is actually a former human, turned into {formerHuman_kindBaseIndef} by some terrible mishap! {formerHuman_pronoun} claims to be {formerHuman_nameFull}, {relatedPawn}'s {relationship}, and is begging you to let {formerHuman_objective} join the colony.
As {formerHuman_kindBaseIndef}, {formerHuman} won't be able to do most kinds of work, but you can craft, buy, or find reverter serum to turn {formerHuman_objective} back into a human. Because {formerHuman} is related to {relatedPawn}, {relatedPawn} will be upset if you turn {formerHuman_objective} away.
LanguageData.PMLetterFormerHumanJoinFeralContent:
{formerHuman_kindBaseIndef} approaches the colony. It seems to be more intelligent than most animals, and your colonists believe {formerHuman_objective} to be a former human that's lost {formerHuman_possessive} ability to speak. {formerHuman_kindBaseDef} seems particularly attached to {relatedPawn}, and is probably someone {relatedPawn_pronoun} is related to.
As a feral {formerHuman_kindBase}, {formerHuman} will act no differently than other {formerHuman_kindBasePlural}, but you can craft, buy, or find reverter serum to turn {formerHuman_objective} back into a human. Because {formerHuman} is related to {relatedPawn}, {relatedPawn} will be upset if you turn {formerHuman_objective} away.
LanguageData.FormerHumanConflicted_DecreaseTransition: [PAWN_nameDef] sapience has dropped to the point they are no longer considered a full colonist.
LanguageData.FormerHumanConflicted_IncreaseTransition: [PAWN_nameDef] sapience has increased to the point they are considered to be fully part of the colony.
LanguageData.LetterChaomorphPasses: A group of {0}s has wandered into the area. They will stay for a while and then leave. You can choose to hunt, tame or revert them if you have the serum for it.
LanguageData.LetterHediffFromTransformationBond: {0} has turned into a {1}! \n\n {0} has bonded with {2} because of their good relationship.
LanguageData.LetterHediffFromPermanentTF: There is no visible change in {0}'s body as the mutagenic mechanites in their system simultaneously purge their memory of the original form. {0} can no longer be turned human with reversion serum -- they will remain an animal forever now.
LanguageData.LetterHediffFromDietChange: {0}'s diet has now changed to be a {1}! Remember to feed them right.
LanguageData.LetterHediffFromEtherBond: Constant production has caused {0} to accept change, and for some reason will now enjoy producing.
LanguageData.LetterHediffFromEtherBroken: Constant production has caused {0} to become numb and submit to their fate.
LanguageData.TransformationStageWarningLabel: {0} is at risk of fully changing very soon.
LanguageData.TransformationStageWarningContent: {0} is at risk of transforming into an animal soon. You can use stabilizer to prevent this.
LanguageData.PMCarryToChamberMerge: Carry {1_label} to mutagen chamber for merging.
LanguageData.MessagePawnResurrectedTransformed: {0} was resurrected, but the mechanite infusion in the serum brought them back as a {2}!
LanguageData.PMFullMorphTfDescription: This person has mechanites in their blood that are slowly mutating them into a {Morph}. Keep an eye on them, as leaving the mechanites unattended could lead to them becoming far more {MorphAdjective} than human.
LanguageData.PMPartialMorphTfDescription: This person has mechanites in their blood that are slowly mutating them into a {Morph}. Keep an eye on them, as leaving the mechanites unattended could lead to them becoming far more {MorphAdjective} than human.
LanguageData.LetterTextMutagenicLeak: A malfunction caused a mutagenic pipe to explode. Some hazardous slurry was leaked all over the floor.
LanguageData.MutagenicLeakWasLarge: That leak was massive! Your janitors may not return fully human...
LanguageData.injectorDescription: A mutagenic injector filled with mechanites and {0} DNA. Use with caution, as leaving the mechanites unchecked may transform the user.
LanguageData.GenomeDesc: Genome that provides information for {MUTATION} mutation.
LanguageData.PMNoStorageAvailableForGenome: Not enough space for {0} in the chamber database.
LanguageData.PMFoodStackMultiplierDescription: Multiplies the max meal size by pawn bodysize.
LanguageData.PMPawnScalingDescription: Changes the size of pawns based on their bodysize.\nThis patch is experimental and may incur visual bugs and glitches.
LanguageData.PMPawnScalingScaleMultiplierTooltip: Multiplier added to the size offset on a pawn.\n Ex. +50% will render as +75% with 150% multipler.
LanguageData.PMPawnScalingMinScaleTooltip: Minimum size a pawn will be able to render.
LanguageData.PMPawnScalingMaxScaleTooltip: Maximum size a pawn will be able to render.
LanguageData.PMPawnScalingUseBodysizeTooltip: If the scaling algorithm should visually scale everything by using a pawns actual body size rather than just those affected by pawnmorpher.
LanguageData.SummaryAddedMutation: Adding \"[MUTATION_NAME]\" mutation to [PAWN_nameDef]'s [MUTATION_PART] at a severity of [MUTATION_SEVERITY].
LanguageData.PMFailedChaobulbHarvest: {PAWN} failed at harvesting a Chaobulb and was contaminated with mutagenic buildup.
LanguageData.MinOptimalGrowthTemperature_Desc: The minimum temperature at which this plant will grow the fastest.
LanguageData.MaxOptimalGrowthTemperature_Desc: The maximum temperature at which this plant will grow the fastest.
LanguageData.enableFalloutCheckboxTooltip: Toggles a special fallout event that can spawn and mutate exposed pawns.
LanguageData.enableMutagenLeakCheckboxTooltip: Toggles a special event where slurry pipes can explode and leak slurry.
LanguageData.enableMutagenCheckboxTooltip: Toggles a new ship part type that mutates pawns in an expanding radius.
LanguageData.enableMutagenDiseasesCheckboxTooltip: Toggles mutagenic disease events that will morph pawns (requires restart).
LanguageData.enableMutagenMeteorCheckboxTooltip: Toggles the ability of mutonite meteors to mutate nearby pawns.
LanguageData.enableWildFormersCheckboxTooltip: Toggles animals spawning onto the map as former humans, allowing them to be reverted.
LanguageData.enableMutationAdaptedStageLabelCheckboxL: Enable stage labels for adapted mutations.
LanguageData.enableMutationAdaptedStageLabelCheckboxT: Enables stage labels on fully adjusted mutations. (Adapted, Grown, etc.)
LanguageData.PMHazardousChaobulbsTooltip: If failed, chaobulb harvests can give mutagenic buildup.
LanguageData.transformChanceSliderLabel: Chance for mutagens to fully transform pawns
LanguageData.formerChanceSliderLabel: Chance for animals to spawn as former humans
LanguageData.partialChanceSliderLabel: Chance for morph eggs/milk to trigger a complete transformation instead of a single mutation
LanguageData.maxMutationThoughtsSliderLabel: How many mutation related thoughts will show up at once
LanguageData.friendlyManhunterTfChance: Chance for friendly pawns to go manhunter when transformed
LanguageData.manhunterTfChance: Chance for pawns to go manhunter when transformed
LanguageData.hostileKeepFactionTfChance: Chance for pawns of other factions to keep their faction when transformed
LanguageData.PMGenerateEndoGenesForAliens: Generate alien endo genes on first revert.
LanguageData.PMGenerateEndoGenesForAliensTooltip: Generate endo genes (skin and hair color) when alien is reverted to human for the first time.
LanguageData.PMInjectorsRequireTaggingTooltip: If true, tagging animals is required to make injectors.
LanguageData.PMEnableMutationVisualsText: Selected races will be patched to show mutations as if they were human, and depending on the race aesthetic results may vary.
LanguageData.PMRequiresRestart: Requires a game restart to take affect.
LanguageData.PMRaceReplacementText: Here you can replace morphs with races from other installed HAR mods.\nThis may not work with all races, use with caution and test before using in a save.
LanguageData.PMOptionalPatchesText: Enable or disable patches that are not strictly necessary for the mod to function.\nHover over a patch to see description.
LanguageData.PMAnimalAssociationsText: Associate additional animals with morphs that will act as both additional outcomes, source of sequencing morph mutations and unlocking the injector.
LanguageData.PMBlacklistFormerHumansText: Enable, restrict or disable animals from randomly appearing as former humans in game.\nAnimals associated with morphs can only be restricted.
LanguageData.PMBlacklistFormerHumansEnabledDescriptio: Can freely appear as former human in game.
LanguageData.PMBlacklistFormerHumansRestrictedDescrip: Can exist as former human but not spawn at random.
LanguageData.PMBlacklistFormerHumansDisabledDescripti: Cannot exist as former human at all.
LanguageData.PMSequencerAutoAnimalGenomeTooltip: Automatically sequence all mutations from animal genome when downloaded.
LanguageData.mutationLogLengthTooltip: Max number of entries remembered by the mutation log.
LanguageData.CannotTagFormerHuman: Due to mechanite contamination, this animal cannot be tagged.
LanguageData.PMMutationNotEnoughSpace: {animal} has mutations that can be recorded, but there is not enough space to store them.
LanguageData.PMAnimalAddedToDatabase: {animal} got added to the genebank database.
LanguageData.PPAddingMutationDesc: Adding {MUTATION} mutation to {PAWN_nameDef}'s {PART} at a severity of {SEVERITY}.
LanguageData.PMAnimalPickerGizmoDescription_Mutagun: Animal mutation to inflict on the target.
